amendment.description: Amendment created a National List of Beaches.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the congressional record to create a National list of Beaches by the Administrator.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Richardson.
